The MISSION Act changes the way VA delivers care to our veterans. It streamlines VA’s community care programs into one and will to allow veterans to have access to non-VA care when they need it.
On Wednesday, May 15, The @MuskogeeVA will host a #townhall to discuss the rollout of the MISSION Act, which goes into effect June 6.
